MapleClient

public MapleClient(org.jboss.netty.channel.Channel session,
                   MapleObfuscator send,
                   MapleObfuscator recv)
Constructs a client with a session, and the respective packet obfuscators.

Parameters:
session - the Channel handling the client's session.
send - the MapleObfuscator handling packets being sent
recv - the MapleObfuscator handling packets being received
